content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly identify ONE historical situation in which the excerpt was produced. Briefly describe ONE argument made in the excerpt. Briefly identify ONE historical effect of the development described in the excerpt.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
